      • registerApp

        public int registerApp(java.lang.String licenseKey,
                       java.lang.String appID,
                       java.lang.String userEmail)
        Registers the application with the server
        Parameters:
        licenseKey - The license key to register with the server.
        appID - The application ID to register with the server.
        userEmail - The users email to register the app with the server.
        Returns:
        The status code returned from the server.

      • checkApp

        public int checkApp(java.lang.String licenseKey,
                    java.lang.String appID,
                    java.lang.String userEmail)
        Checks the license status with the server.
        Parameters:
        licenseKey - The license key to verify with the server.
        appID - The appID to verify with the server.
        userName - The users name to verify with the server.
        Returns:
        The status code returned from the server.

        Registers a user with the server
        Parameters:
        userName - The users name to register with the server.
        userEmail - The users email to register with the server.
        Returns:
        The status code returned from the server.
